Get 5 KES for every plastic bottle recycled at our stations, incentivizing you to help clean up our environment.

We turn collected plastics into toys, art, and durable furniture using Wood Plastic Composite (WPC), reducing waste and promoting sustainability.

We employ local youth, fund scientific research, and offer educational programs and scholarships, fostering a culture of environmental responsibility and providing opportunities for growth.

ABOUT US

We aim to reduce plastic waste by incentivizing plastic bottle recycling. Our facility uses innovative barcode scanning technology to reward recyclers with 5 Kenyan Shillings per bottle, deposited into their MPESA accounts. This system promotes recycling, reduces pollution, and conserves resources. We also educate communities on environmental conservation through various outreach programs. Join us in creating a cleaner, greener future.

OUR VISION

Our vision is to create a sustainable future by transforming society's perception of recycling. We inspire individuals to embrace a culture of recycling through innovative incentives and seamless processes. Our goal is to minimize the harmful effects of plastic waste, conserve resources, and raise environmental consciousness. Together, we can build a harmonious coexistence between humanity and nature, contributing to a cleaner, healthier, and more sustainable planet.
